Texts.Chs: 据说一座古老的鲛人山脉被诅咒了。你敢调查一下吗？
Texts.Eng: An ancient Hylotl mountain is said to be cursed. Dare you investigate?

Texts.Chs: 我走遍了这座山脉。不管发生了什么，古人似乎最终要为此负责。
Texts.Eng: I've traversed the entirety of this mountain. Whatever was going on here, seems like the ancients were ultimately responsible for it.
Investigate the peak of Mount Gigant.
